newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Slovenia's GPG to list more shares.
newsitem.headline: Slovenia's GPG to list more shares.

text.p: Slovenian construction group GPG will list 24,646 shares on the Ljubljana bourse's main market later this month, taking the total number of listed shares to 172,210, the bourse said on Thursday.
Following the issue, the shares will represent 86 percent of GPG's equity.
The bourse said trading in GPG shares would be halted on April 14, probably until April 30, to allow registration of the new GPG shares at the central securities' registry KDD.
GPG's shares, which have a nominal value of 10,000 tolars each, were last traded on April 4, when they fell 8.15 percent to 6,200 tolars on volume of 33 shares.
